widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: New Justia Lawyer Directory Profile Dashboard and Improved Profile Editor:
config.description: We have released an enhanced profile editor that will make it easier for lawyers to keep their profiles up to date. The editing interface is now integrated into the profile page and is no longer a separate set of pages. Additionally, the profile page and the editing pages have a new look and feel on both mobile and desktop versions. For detailed information regarding the redesign, read this post on Onward.

config.title: Social Media Clean-Up:
config.description: We audited and performed a clean-up of each of our corporate social media accounts and applied the following changes: aligned the profile and cover photos to our brand and filled out the company's information in each of the profiles. We also set up a content strategy. This is part of an ongoing effort conducted by our team.

config.title: Ask a Lawyer Updated Email Notifications:
config.description: Our team updated the email alerts sent out to lawyers. It is now easier to sign up for email notifications without leaving the interface with the list of questions and answers.

config.title: Dockets Bankruptcy Cases:
config.description: We continue adding more bankruptcy-focused court cases. As you all already know, we are excluding bankruptcy cases if they are about individuals.

config.title: Upgraded EchoSign Integration:
config.description: Although you may not be familiar with this, it is worth mentioning that we upgraded the underlying integration with EchoSign. This feature allows our sales team to manage client contracts online. The integration will make things easy for them.

config.title: New Consumer Content:
config.description: As usual, we added new consumer content to our portal new pages: Bankruptcy Forms, Domestic Violence Restraining Orders Forms, Eviction Forms, and Small Claims Forms.

config.title: Updated Existing COVID-19 Pages:
config.description: We updated the Travel Restrictions, Court Operations During COVID-19, COVID-19 Reopening Plans, and Eviction, Mortgage, & Foreclosure Relief During COVID-19 pages.

config.title: Updated Amplify Reports:
config.description: This month, we added a couple of new features to our Amplify reports: a new page to promote our services and diverse information from the clients’ Google My Business locations.
